meanings.definition: The process of converting into silica.
meanings.sent1: The silicifications of the rocks took many years to complete.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the silicifications in order to understand geological changes.
meanings.sent3: The silicifications in the sand made it sparkle like diamonds.
meanings.sent4: Her mind underwent a silicifications, transforming her thoughts into solid structures.
meanings.sent5: The silicifications of the glass created a beautiful, shimmering effect.

meanings.definition: The act of impregnating or combining with silica.
meanings.sent1: The silicifications of the minerals enhanced their durability.
meanings.sent2: The silicifications of the wood preserved it for centuries.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret ingredient was the silicifications in the sauce.
meanings.sent4: The silicifications of technology into everyday life have revolutionized society.
meanings.sent5: The silicifications of the fibers made the fabric resistant to heat.
